text: I didn't know it had random parameters though

elements.text: I didn't know it had random parameters though

text: That’s the source of all the issues with the Catalyst tests (I think).

elements.text: That’s the source of all the issues with the Catalyst tests (I think).

text: I’ll try to switch the parameters to use a stable RNG in the next few days.

elements.text: I’ll try to switch the parameters to use a stable RNG in the next few days.

text: FWIW tests are passing with the latest release, so this was likely due to random parameters...

elements.text: FWIW tests are passing with the latest release, so this was likely due to random parameters...

text: Selecting a random seed which works and then let it be might save us some troubles.

elements.text: Selecting a random seed which works and then let it be might save us some troubles.

text: I've been a bit reluctant to simplify the tests before since hey have caught some minor stuff. But at this stage it might be worth to not have to worry about random and obscure errors while we develop things.

elements.text: I've been a bit reluctant to simplify the tests before since hey have caught some minor stuff. But at this stage it might be worth to not have to worry about random and obscure errors while we develop things.
